articles.description: The South Korean manufacturer's high-end set from 2022, which is often referred to as one of the very best OLED TVs on the market, has now hit its lowest price yet as the 65-inch version of the LG G2 has gone on sale for an intriguing deal price of US$1,799.
articles.content: A new year also means that new and exciting televisions are about to be officially unveiled, although it usually takes another few months until these displays are in stock and readily available at re… [+1592 chars]
